definition: to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
to count backwards (from 10 down to 0)/to count down/from the bottom (lines on a page)/from the back (rows of seats)
to count backwards (from 10 down to 0)/to count down/from the bottom (lines on a page)/from the back (rows of seats)
to fall down/to slip and fall/to throw sb to the ground
to knock down/to knock over/to run over (sb)
to have bad luck/to be out of luck
to resell at a profit/to speculate

sentences.english: For the past few days, there has instead been rioting in the square.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的幾天裏，廣場上沒有垃圾，倒是有一場暴亂。

sentences.english: Blush can be poured through a hidden semi-transparent cover, very fitting skin.
sentences.chinese: 腮紅可透過隱藏的半透明罩倒出，極度貼合肌膚。

sentences.english: He heard the contents of the glass being poured into the sink .
sentences.chinese: 他聽到杯中物被倒進水盆裏。

sentences.english: Few drinks at the dinner will find us all snoozed at the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯來幾杯，過會紛紛睡倒在沙發上了。

sentences.english: But, if a man bites a dog, that might make front-page news.
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果人咬了狗，那倒可能成爲頭版新聞。

sentences.english: The truck backed up to the hole and dumped the trash In it.
sentences.chinese: 卡車倒開到洞邊，將垃圾倒進洞裏。

sentences.english: The truck backed up to the hole and dumped the trash In it.
sentences.chinese: 卡車倒開到洞邊，將垃圾倒進洞裏。

sentences.english: The film is an American version of a two thousand eight French thriller called "Pour Elle."
sentences.chinese: 這部電影是一個二千八法語稱爲“倒艾莉。”

sentences.english: A C.O. fills a cup of coffee in the Guard Room.
sentences.chinese: 在警衛室內，一個獄警在倒咖啡。

sentences.english: He was right, of course, to avoid the mayoralty trap.
sentences.chinese: 當然，他躲開了市長這個圈套倒是正確的。

sentences.english: There's one thing you do like to do.
sentences.chinese: 有一件事你倒很喜歡做。

sentences.english: Noda Take regret the pain, two people fall together.
sentences.chinese: 野田毅後悔痛苦，二人倒在了一起。

sentences.english: We used a funnel plot to evaluate reports for publication bias.
sentences.chinese: 我們使用倒漏斗圖形對出版偏倚的報道進行評價。

sentences.english: Surprisingly, after chewing it for a bit, he found it sweetish and rather pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 當下伸手接過，咬了一口，咀嚼之下，倒也甘美可口。

sentences.english: She poured too vigorously and half the gingerale foamed away.
sentences.chinese: 她倒得太猛，一半的姜汽水冒泡溢出。

sentences.english: The naughty child dumped his cup of milk in the sink.
sentences.chinese: 那個頑皮的小孩把他那一杯牛奶倒到水槽裏。

definition: contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to
to skim/lightly touching the water (as the dragonfly in the idiom 蜻蜓點水|蜻蜓点水)/skin-deep
to appear to be/to seem as if
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
erhua variant of 一點|一点[yi1 dian3]
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
